name: Stunt Car: Fire Volcano Road
description:
Stunt Car: Fire Volcano Road is a driving of impossible car crashed in lava. You are driving your lava vs. furious car challenge down a spring of gushing lava which has recently ejected and the hot magma is directly behind you, so utilize all the power your furious car drifting stunt master needs to help up its speed and make it securely to the finish of the street.
Features:
- You can play offline
- Real life stunt mania game
- Hard Driving game with challenging and difficult parking levels
- Mid-air stunts and sky high driving tracks
- Amazing volcanic tracks with dangerous sharp turns, jumps and obstacles
